org.opentcs.util.configuration

Class ItemConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentcs.util.configuration.ItemConstraint
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ItemConstraintBoolean, ItemConstraintDouble, ItemConstraintEnum, ItemConstraintFloat, ItemConstraintInteger, ItemConstraintString
    Deprecated. 
    Use interface bindings and configuration mechanism provided via applications' dependency injection.

    @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
public abstract class ItemConstraint
extends java.lang.Object
    Constraints on a configuration item.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ItemConstraint

        public ItemConstraint(ConfigurationDataType newType,
                      double minVal,
                      double maxVal,
                      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> values)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates item constraint and sets the data type .
        Parameters:
        newType - provides the data type of the item.
        values - provides the enum values incase the data type is enum.
        minVal - It is the minimum Value for the ConfugrationData Type specified by newType.
        maxVal - It is the maximum Value for the ConfugrationData Type specified by newType.

        Parameters:
        value - of the configuration item .
        Returns:
        a boolean value, true if the value is acceptable and false otherwise .
